## Research Interests
computational imaging & microscopy

## Brief Bio
Andrey obtained his PhD in Physics from Russian Academy of Sciences, Novosibirsk. Andrey was a Postdoctoral Researcher in the group from Jul 2023 - June 2024. He worked on atomic resolution ptychographic electron tomography. He went on to become a [ML R&D Engineer at Huawei](https://www.linkedin.com/in/avmromanov/).
